text: The source of my inspiration came to the worker of reporter sportive, Especially football. I really want to work in this industry. I thought during long years working in the e-commerce but the last after one year in BTS NDRC,  I make a discovery, a new passion.I play football since my 6 years old but i never thought i can work for a web Tv on football. And I never make careful at the reporter, the debrief after the game and the analyse of  the game. In Paris we have so many Web TV on football, “RMC Sport”, “L’équipe 21” and “SO FOOT” for example. Football is my passion. I can watch so many game in just one day. So I chose this formation, the L1 information communication because I need to upgrade my general culture and my expression write, I think after my three years here in the university of Paris 2 im going into a Master of Journalism and why not after working for RMC for example. I don’t really know if I want to be a reporter on the ground, the guy who’s going make a interview with the player after the game or the guy most in the analyse of the game on Tv. I think I need more time and the school gonna help me.
